duties_responsibilities.duty: Receives on-the-job training for Medical Transport Driver and Emergency Medical Technician roles, while completing the required coursework for Emergency Medical Technician national & Pennsylvania state certification.
Performing safe transport of non-emergent clients as a Medical Transport Driver.
Performing team-based care of the sick and injured and providing basic life support care to those requesting Emergency Medical Services response as an Emergency Medical Technician.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required
Valid driver's license required or eligible for a Commonwealth of PA license if out of state
